title: When I Launch Alpha Client, it comes up black screen. Can't play...
body: When I double click the league of legends application, it just pops up a totally blank screen. Please, whoever responds, don't give me a bullshit response like "read the bug ticket" or "run a diagnosis" or some shit. Sorry for my attitude, I had 1 hour to myself this whole week and I wanted to play league, and it's not fucking working. I'm sick of this!

replies.body: Are you on a PC or Mac?  Black screen issues are usually caused by connection problems failing to load assets, and independent of what client version you're using.  Not trying to give you a bullshit answer, but you'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case anything with your network is causing issues.  I know you've been at this for a bit but I want to help!  I don't have a magicwand, so these steps help rule out possibilities.  I hope that helps!

Thank you for trying to help me and also answering me personally. I dislike many of the staff members who copy and paste random answers, so I thank you for getting back to me on a personal level. Fortunately, it fixed itself after I played around with it a bit.

~tsnakejake
do you know what you did because it still happens for me.. ur my last hope

Mine fixed itself after messing around with the Wifi and also doing this:
Go to Leaague application, right click and press "show package contents."
Contents > LoL > RADS > system > and you'll find something that says UserKernel. Delete this item.
Download a new league of legends and transfer go through the same process on the new League application, except this time transfer the new UserKernel to the old one where it was before. Then launch the old one. I hope this works, if it doesn't, get back to me and I'll give you another solution.

Best of luck friend, keep contacting me if it doesn't work.
hey there, im using wired internet and that solution didnt work for me :(

Huh! So weird, yeah? 
Let me try to find you something.

Edit: Did this happen around April 27th, when the alpha client took place?
yes it did! i made a post about my problem!

Ahhhh ok! Link me to your post please?

Edit AGAIN: Are you on a mac or windows?
im on windows! here is the link: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/YTpIW6if-black-screen-after-launch-with-sounds-and-being-able-to-click-help-please
